articles.title: Thibault Senegas
articles.contents:
Thibault Senegas
          
          
          Home
          Resume
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Thibault Senegas

            My name is Thibault Senegas and I am a data scientist at nüance-R where I work on the development of ed-tech simulations (quantum simulations*) and on solutions for the digital transformation of companies.
            I finished my M.Sc. in International Business from HEC Montreal in 2016 and got a master’s engineering degree from INP/ENSIACET (Toulouse, France) with a major in Materials Sciences and a minor in Industrial Systems. I worked at IBM Canada as a data scientist consultant in the Advanced Analytics practice.
            I live in Montréal, QC, with my wife and my son.
            This website is built with distill for R Markdown. I deploy my website using Netlify. My blog posts are released under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

I worked at IBM Canada as a data scientist consultant in the Advanced Analytics practice.
              I live in Montréal, QC, with my wife and my son.

articles.title: Resume
articles.contents:
Skills
Machine learning, natural language processing, text mining, data analysis
R, Shiny, SQL, GitHub, Docker, Markdown, shell scripting
Data Scientist & Product Manager, quantum simulations* (nüance-R)
2020-present
Lead development of simulations from design through development to commercialization
Dev and built framework for deploy e-simulations through shiny and docker
VP R&D and Innovation, SKEMA Global Lab in Augmented Intelligence (nüance-R)
2019-2020
Development of SKEMA Quantum Studio platform, an ecosystem for learning and implementing data science
Data Scientist Consultant, IBM Services
2017-2019
Data science consulting for Retail, Financial and Insurance industries from contracting with customer to final deliverable.
Built model for estimate Implied Demand
Built Demand Forecast models
Built NLP classification models
Create and automate reports which include data visualization
Research Professional and Data Scientist, CIRANO
2015-2017
Development of mondo.international(https://mondo.international), an high tech platform that uses Data Science for International Business, Economics and Finance.
Development of Open Science, a new “OS” for Data Science. This platform is dedicated to the International Business field of research with Data Science as the core methodology. We also value reproducible research, and open source developments.
Engineer Consultant
2013
Technical and functional consultant for implementation of Planisware (OPX2): European leader in project management tools and business.
Education
HEC Montreal - M.Sc. in International Business, 2016
INP/ENSIACET - Engineer degree in Materials Sciences, 2013
Others
Avant Garde @ CIRANO - cohort 2020
